xml.resource:
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>strabic test</title> 
<style type="text/css">
body {
  width: $1px;
  font-family: $2;
  color: $3;
  background-color:$4;
}
</style>
<script src="processing.js"></script>
</head>
<body>

<script type="text/processing" data-processing-target="$1">
void setup()
{
  size(200,200);
  background(125);
  fill(255);
  noLoop();
  PFont fontA = loadFont("courier");
  textFont(fontA, 14);  
}

void draw(){  
  text("Hello Web!",20,20);
  println("Hello ErrorLog!");
}
</script>
<canvas id="$1"></canvas>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
   font-family:Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;
  color: rgb(0,50,150);
}
</style>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
   font-family:Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;
  color: rgb(150,50,0);
}
</style>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
   border: 2px solid #665544;
   position: absolute;
   top: $2px;
   left: $3px;
   width: $4px;
   height: $5px;
   background-color: rgb(200,10,200);
   z-index: $6;
}
</style>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
	width:$2px;
	height:$3px;
	background-color: #2AD1A2;
	border: solid 2px black;
	font-size: 10px;
	text-align: center;
	line-height: 70px
}
</style>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
   border: 4px solid #665544;
   position: absolute;
   top: $2px;
   left: $3px;
   width: $4px;
   height: $5px;
   background-color: rgb(10,10,10);
   z-index: $6;
}
</style>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
   border: 4px solid #665544;
   position: absolute;
   top: $2px;
   left: $3px;
   width: $4px;
   height: $5px;
   background-color: rgb(10,10,10);
   z-index: $6;
}
</style>
